fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl

Class OvhSmsSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.core.sender.AbstractSpecializedSender<fr.sii.ogham.sms.message.Sms>
      • fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.OvhSmsSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sii.ogham.core.sender.MessageSender, fr.sii.ogham.core.sender.SpecializedSender<fr.sii.ogham.sms.message.Sms>

    public class OvhSmsSender
extends fr.sii.ogham.core.sender.AbstractSpecializedSender<fr.sii.ogham.sms.message.Sms>
    Implementation that is able to send SMS through OVH web service. This sender requires that phone numbers are provided using either:
    • E.164 international format (prefixed with '+' followed by country code)
    • E.123 international format (prefixed with '+' followed by country code and can contain spaces)
    • Using 13 digits: country code on 4 digits followed by number. For example, 0033 6 01 02 03 04 is a valid French number (country code is 33, additional '0' are added to reach the 4 digits)
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
